title: 11+ Best Staplers in 2025
description: Looking for the best stapler in 2023? No wonder, as the best staplers are a permanent fixture on every desk. Fill that empty space you've been trying to fill.

byline: Meet our expert writers and contributors
excerpt: Looking for the best stapler in 2024? No wonder, as the best staplers are a permanent fixture on every desk. Fill that empty space you've been trying to fill.
text: Looking for the best stapler in 2025? We’ve got you covered. A stapler is a mechanical device that binds papers together using a single pin and can be easily found on almost every office desk in the world. Using a stapler helps you do your job faster than compared with paper clips. Its easy-to-reload design works well with a staple remover if you want to disconnect papers later. We started thinking though. What if you’re starting a new job and don’t have a stapler? You’d want the best one you could find right? Lucky for you, that’s what we’re good at. Come with us and we’ll get you fixed up in no time. Also, don’t miss to check out our blogs on the best dry erase boards. 11+ Best Staplers in 2025 Bostitch Office Heavy Duty 40-Sheet Stapler — The best stapler in 2025 overall (Editor’s Choice) Praxxis Pro Staplers — The best budget stapler Swingline 747 Business Stapler — The best value stapler Paper Clinch Lightweight Portable Stapler — The best staple-free stapler Amazon Basics Stapler — The best everyday stapler Rapid Classic K1 Plier Stapler — The best sturdy stapler Deli Jam Resistant Stapler — The best jam-resistant stapler Rapesco HD-73 Plier Stapler — The best comfortable plier stapler Swingline Stapler Value Pack — The Best Value Stapler Set Rapesco ECO 790 Long-Arm Stapler — The best recyclable stapler Swingline Compact Manual Stapler — The best compact stapler Which is the Best Stapler in 2025? Bostitch office heavy-duty stapler is the best stapler in 2025. Have a look at the table given below to find the comparison between staplers and choose the one that fits your requirements. Editor’s Choice Pros: Light-weightSheet capacityOpens up to 180 degrees Best budget stapler Pros: CheapSmall and handy to carry aroundComes in a variety of colors Best staple-free stapler Pros: Easy to useLong-lastingLightweight and comfortable 03/27/2025 08:50 am GMT Different Types of Staplers When you need to buy a stapler, you will find that each one will generally fit into one of four classifications: Office Stapler:  This is the most common type of stapler available. These portable and light staplers help you keep sheets of up to 20 papers at a time. Electric Stapler: If you want to staple low-volume documents, an electric stapler helps you speed up the process. These electric staplers rely on the electricity on the battery and most come with anti-jam technology. You can staple the collection of papers cleanly. But a manual stapler can bend and tear up paper anytime. Plier Stapler:  Plier staplers work by inserting the paper between the gaps of the papers. They are easy to use when sealing cardboard boxes, so the packaging industry uses them. They can be used in the packaging industry to affix packing labels. A standard plier stapler accommodates only 0.25″ staples. This limits stapling to 30 pages at a time. Heavy duty: A heavy-duty stapler comes with a manual lever and helps when you are stapling hundreds of pages. This is the best option for you to staple large stacks of documents. Long Reach Staplers: Long-reach staplers are designed for using it on bookbinding, brochures, and pamphlets. This stapler is used in hard-to-reach places where usual office staplers can’t reach. 11+ Best Staplers in 2025 1. Bostitch Office Heavy Duty 40-Sheet Stapler (Editor’s Choice) Bostitch Office Heavy Duty Stapler. Image Credits: Amazon The best overall stapler in 2025 Type: Manual | Capacity: 40 Sheets | Material: Rubber | Weight: 7.7 Ounces | Color: Black The Bostitch office heavy-duty stapler can staple about 40 sheets at a time. Some heavy-duty staplers can accommodate more sheets but this stapler is simple enough that we can use it with one hand. It’s small but efficient and economical for any office space. By far, this is the best stapler available. This stapler also comes with a flat-clinch technology which means fewer instances of staple jams. We like how the flat design creates flatter and neater stapled paper stacks and can open up to 180 degrees for board tacking or crafting. When you buy the two-stapler set, it comes with two boxes of staples that contain 1000 staples per box. At first sight, we already know they’re not heavy-duty options but they work well for smaller bunches of paper. It’s also convenient to carry around when you’re an employee on the go. In terms of being compact, this stapler is our top recommendation. Its comfortable handling and non-slip rubber base provide stability and ease of use during busy workdays. The stapler’s ability to open 180° allows for quick and easy tacking to bulletin boards, while the rotatable anvil lets you switch between temporary and permanent stapling with minimal effort. It also has a front-loading system, an all-metal chassis, and an impressive 50-sheet capacity. It is an ideal choice for stapling small booklets because it has a throat depth of 300mm. Image Credits: Amazon The best compact stapler Type: Manual | Capacity: 20 sheets | Material: Plastic steel | Weight: 4.8 ounces | Color: Multi-color The Swingline stapler is a comfortable and ergonomic handheld stapler capable of stapling up to 20 sheets of paper. The stapler holds easily a half strip of 105 staples, and it has a one-year warranty. It also has a low staple indicator that displays a red light when it is time to reload. The vertical standing design makes it easy to hold on and reduces the space on your desktop. Pros Cons ➕ Comes in attractive colors ➖ Has a limited 1-year warranty period. ➕ Does not occupy much space ➕ Low staple indicator Latest Price on Amazon: Best compact stapler What to Look For in a Stapler Total Number of Sheets: The sheet capacity of the stapler varies for each model, so it is essential to know the capacity of the stapler you want to purchase. A manual stapler can handle up to 30 sheets at a time, but a heavy-duty stapler can staple more than 200 pages at once. Durability: The main factor you need to consider while deciding on the stapler is the life of the stapler. To save money, you might invest in a cheaper model, but it is better to invest money in a quality stapler, so it lasts longer. Comfort: You can reduce this to a great extent by purchasing a stapler that has a designed grip or an adapted lever. Many staplers are made entirely of metal, which makes them heavy or difficult to grip, but many modern models come with plastic coatings on their handles that might reduce the level of discomfort. Anti-Jamming Technology: It is frustrating if the stapler pins get jammed when you use the stapler because they are difficult to remove, so you should purchase a stapler with anti-jamming technology. Frequently Asked Questions What do you mean by flat-clinch technology with regard to staplers? Flat clinch staplers come with a stapling plate that makes the staple legs permanently flat after stapling, but the standard staplers curve the staple legs once stapled. What do you mean by staple indicators? Some staplers come with staple indicators. Low staple indicators in staplers show when the staplers need reloading. Which brand has the best stapler? Although each stapler has its own benefits, some popular brands include Swingline, Bostitch, and Rapid. Is there a stapler that does not use staples? Yes, the Paper Clinch Lightweight Portable Stapler does not use any staples. Can staples be recycled? There is no need to worry about removing the staples while recycling papers. When you recycle papers with staples, they also get recycled with other steel products. How Stapler pins are made? The fully Automatic Staple Pin Making Machines make stapler pins. Best Staplers Summary The best staplers will help you organize paperwork at the office efficiently. Staplers have always been a necessity in every workspace, whether it’s for personal or communal use. If there are a bunch of documents and papers that need to be kept together, a stapler is a handy tool for you. If you’re keen on producing as little waste as possible, there are also staplers that don’t need staples. We have also given you staplers that are heavy-duty and those that can be used for pinning up small booklets and documents. It’s all on our list of the best staplers to keep you well-informed in making decisions regarding your purchase. If you are using any of these products on the list or are interested in getting them, share your thoughts with us in the comments below! html:
Looking for the best stapler in 2025? We’ve got you covered.

A stapler is a mechanical device that binds papers together using a single pin and can be easily found on almost every office desk in the world.

Using a stapler helps you do your job faster than compared with paper clips. Its easy-to-reload design works well with a staple remover if you want to disconnect papers later.

We started thinking though. What if you’re starting a new job and don’t have a stapler? You’d want the best one you could find right?

Lucky for you, that’s what we’re good at. Come with us and we’ll get you fixed up in no time.

Also, don’t miss to check out our blogs on the best dry erase boards.

11+ Best Staplers in 2025

  1. Bostitch Office Heavy Duty 40-Sheet Stapler — The best stapler in 2025 overall (Editor’s Choice)
  2. Praxxis Pro Staplers — The best budget stapler
  3. Swingline 747 Business Stapler — The best value stapler
  4. Paper Clinch Lightweight Portable Stapler — The best staple-free stapler
  5. Amazon Basics Stapler — The best everyday stapler
  6. Rapid Classic K1 Plier Stapler — The best sturdy stapler
  7. Deli Jam Resistant Stapler — The best jam-resistant stapler
  8. Rapesco HD-73 Plier Stapler — The best comfortable plier stapler
  9. Swingline Stapler Value Pack — The Best Value Stapler Set
  10. Rapesco ECO 790 Long-Arm Stapler — The best recyclable stapler
  11. Swingline Compact Manual Stapler — The best compact stapler

Which is the Best Stapler in 2025?

Bostitch office heavy-duty stapler is the best stapler in 2025. Have a look at the table given below to find the comparison between staplers and choose the one that fits your requirements.

Pros:

  • Light-weight
  • Sheet capacity
  • Opens up to 180 degrees

Best budget stapler

  • Small and handy to carry around
  • Comes in a variety of colors

Best staple-free stapler

Pros:

  • Easy to use
  • Long-lasting

03/27/2025 08:50 am GMT

Different Types of Staplers

When you need to buy a stapler, you will find that each one will generally fit into one of four classifications:

  • Office Stapler: 

This is the most common type of stapler available. These portable and light staplers help you keep sheets of up to 20 papers at a time.

  • Electric Stapler:

If you want to staple low-volume documents, an electric stapler helps you speed up the process. These electric staplers rely on the electricity on the battery and most come with anti-jam technology. You can staple the collection of papers cleanly. But a manual stapler can bend and tear up paper anytime.

  • Plier Stapler: 

Plier staplers work by inserting the paper between the gaps of the papers. They are easy to use when sealing cardboard boxes, so the packaging industry uses them. They can be used in the packaging industry to affix packing labels. A standard plier stapler accommodates only 0.25″ staples. This limits stapling to 30 pages at a time.

  • Heavy duty:

A heavy-duty stapler comes with a manual lever and helps when you are stapling hundreds of pages. This is the best option for you to staple large stacks of documents.

  • Long Reach Staplers:

Long-reach staplers are designed for using it on bookbinding, brochures, and pamphlets. This stapler is used in hard-to-reach places where usual office staplers can’t reach.

11+ Best Staplers in 2025

1. Bostitch Office Heavy Duty 40-Sheet Stapler (Editor’s Choice)

The best overall stapler in 2025

Type: Manual | Capacity: 40 Sheets | Material: Rubber | Weight: 7.7 Ounces | Color: Black

The Bostitch office heavy-duty stapler can staple about 40 sheets at a time. Some heavy-duty staplers can accommodate more sheets but this stapler is simple enough that we can use it with one hand.

It’s small but efficient and economical for any office space. By far, this is the best stapler available.

This stapler also comes with a flat-clinch technology which means fewer instances of staple jams.

We like how the flat design creates flatter and neater stapled paper stacks and can open up to 180 degrees for board tacking or crafting.

Pros

Cons
➕ Light-weight ➖ Not durable
➕ Sheet capacity
➕ Opens up to 180 degrees

The Praxis Pro Mini stapler is a portable and small-sized stapler option that comes as a set of two or four staplers.

When you buy the two-stapler set, it comes with two boxes of staples that contain 1000 staples per box.

At first sight, we already know they’re not heavy-duty options but they work well for smaller bunches of paper.

It’s also convenient to carry around when you’re an employee on the go. In terms of being compact, this stapler is our top recommendation.

From our experience, it can hold a strip of more than 210 staples at once and is easy to handle due to its ergonomic design.

What to Look For in a Stapler

Total Number of Sheets:

The sheet capacity of the stapler varies for each model, so it is essential to know the capacity of the stapler you want to purchase. A manual stapler can handle up to 30 sheets at a time, but a heavy-duty stapler can staple more than 200 pages at once.

Durability:

The main factor you need to consider while deciding on the stapler is the life of the stapler. To save money, you might invest in a cheaper model, but it is better to invest money in a quality stapler, so it lasts longer.

Comfort:

You can reduce this to a great extent by purchasing a stapler that has a designed grip or an adapted lever. Many staplers are made entirely of metal, which makes them heavy or difficult to grip, but many modern models come with plastic coatings on their handles that might reduce the level of discomfort.

Anti-Jamming Technology:

It is frustrating if the stapler pins get jammed when you use the stapler because they are difficult to remove, so you should purchase a stapler with anti-jamming technology.

Frequently Asked Questions

What do you mean by flat-clinch technology with regard to staplers?

Flat clinch staplers come with a stapling plate that makes the staple legs permanently flat after stapling, but the standard staplers curve the staple legs once stapled.

What do you mean by staple indicators?

Some staplers come with staple indicators. Low staple indicators in staplers show when the staplers need reloading.

Which brand has the best stapler?

Although each stapler has its own benefits, some popular brands include Swingline, Bostitch, and Rapid.

Is there a stapler that does not use staples?

Yes, the Paper Clinch Lightweight Portable Stapler does not use any staples.

Can staples be recycled?

There is no need to worry about removing the staples while recycling papers. When you recycle papers with staples, they also get recycled with other steel products.

How Stapler pins are made?

The fully Automatic Staple Pin Making Machines make stapler pins.
